website_summaries.verdict: Elegant design and engineered to provide a quiet night's sleep.
pros: Designed with 3- to 6-inch slats, providing comfortable support for varying weights
We love the added touches to this frame that keep mattresses from shifting
cons: Be sure to read instructions on how to properly care for the fabric as it may wear

customer_reviews.title: Bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Don’t purchase!!! found an infestation of bed bugs in the headboard when i unzipped it so gross have to throw away
customer_reviews.author: Sam W

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this bed:)
customer_reviews.text: First off I have to say how impressed I was with the packaging, EVERYTHING is packed inside the headboard. It is easy to assemble and looks great!! I have cats who I knew would start to sharpen their claws on it and amazingly it doesnt hardly show any damage, the fabric is TOUGH!! Well worth every penny, I have already recommended to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Glama Girl

customer_reviews.title: BED BUGS!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: we found a bunch of bed bugs in this headboard!!! There’s a bunch of other reviews complaining of the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Asaf Galeano

customer_reviews.title: Infested with Bed Bugs!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Headboard is absolutely infested with Bed Bugs. It is disgusting!! Avoid at all costs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and missing parts for assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ever been disappointed in an Amazon purchase. Most of the pieces were ripped and I only received about half of the installation hardware. I needed to set it up right away for guests so i made it work and didn't bother with a return. It's sturdy enough (once i went out and bought additional fasteners) and looks nice from a distance but I'm disappointed that anyone would ship an item in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: JAY ARRE

customer_reviews.title: Bed bugs infestation
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor do not buy this bed. Read the reviews before purchasing. The bed head is infested with bed bugs. You won’t realized it until a week or two after setting it up. My newborn was getting bite all the time and I kept taking her to the er and they told me it’s bed big. I had a professional came in and clean the house but they didn’t really find nothing in the house. When they open the boxes the entire head board was infested with big bugs I took the boxed with the beds and put them in the garbage. Please please please don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Queen headboard
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very easy to assemble. Looks great too. We purchased it for our guest bedroom and ordered a 10" mattress. Very happy! Literally took about 20 min to put together. Great deal especially for the price. Wish they came in other colors we would upgrade our king bed!!
customer_reviews.author: The Grubes

customer_reviews.title: BED BUGS
customer_reviews.text: I saw other reviews of Zinus products having bed bugs and thought they were just being stupid and leaving food everywhere. 4-5 months after getting this product I now have bed bugs nowhere else in my room EXCEPT for on the back of the headboard. They were everywhere. Eggs too. Please tell me how my whole life I never had bed bugs and 4 months after I buy this product I get a massive amount of bed bugs. 0 stars. I threw it out and want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: I was not very pleased with my purchase, after a couple months it broke completely in the middle of the night and flung my fiancé out of bed. When I first ordered it and put it together the slats didn’t even fit to each side correctly. After reading reviews I saw that was normal but that other customers beds still worked fine, so I let it go. Then the bed started falling apart where the bottom sides came together, every other night. Do yourself a favor and buy a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Teafatiller

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This platform and headboard is so poorly made that you shouldn't even consider buying it. It has two sharp nails trying to poke through the thin fabric along the edge of the headboard. Frankly, it's dangerous. Also view the white stain on a side panel. What IS that stuff? Customer service is just as bad as the bedframe. Their only advice was to contact Amazon for instructions on how to rebox and return. Too many complaints to handle? Just send 'em all back (if you can, wink wink). DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: classic

customer_reviews.title: One of the legs is longer than the rest. Basically, useless.
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs is longer than the rest. Basically, useless.
customer_reviews.author: UCLAgradstudent

customer_reviews.title: Defective headboard
customer_reviews.text: It's such a disappointing item. The headboard had a huge hole supposedly for the legs. BUT it's really big without anything to stabilize it or keep it firmly in place. The work that got put in as well as lugging it up upstairs! ON TOP OF THAT I have to pay over $30 for shipping the mattress back because of this defective bed. So horrified that I now have to deal with the UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The frame doesn't fit together properly. The center bar ...
customer_reviews.text: The frame doesn't fit together properly. The center bar is to short to reach to both ends. I didn't expect something that didn't assemble properly.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: CHEMICAL SMELL WILL MAKE YOU SICK
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this unless you like swimming in fire retardant, we assembled it for our bed and it's been 3 weeks and we are unable to sleep in the room. the odor from whatever they spray on it is making everyone sick. I can't stop coughing and last night had a bad asthma attack from it. My wife coughed up some blood and keeps getting headaches. We've resorted to sleeping on the couch for now until we can get something different and throw this away.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Thus is a gorgeous headboard and base for a queen bed! It looks much more expensive than it is. We were so impressed with the quality of the material and how easy it was to put together! It comes so efficiently packaged and designed that it is virtually fool-proof. It is extremely sturdy; no wiggling or shaking of the frame or movement of the mattress at all. We are going to be buying another one for ourselves, as this was for our teenage son who also found it impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy39Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: BED BUGS.
customer_reviews.text: Never had this issue before with my wood frames. Got this frame in June 3. For the past month my girlfriend was being evaluated for rash. We look for bed bugs around mattress and frame but we did not found anything. After 1 month of treatment and 1 dermatologist I recall that the frame had a zipper behind, found BedBug Infestation inside the frame. Will try to contact seller for refund (Matress same company seems ok for now).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fratti

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer defect and run around
customer_reviews.text: During the setup of this bed frame there was a manufacturer defect that prevented a major part of the bed to be screwed in. An easy replacement part would have worked, but after contacting Zinus, they referred me to amazon. My only option was to send the item back for a replacement or return. In most instances that is fine, but with a 80+lb large package it was an incredible hassle to repack, re-tape and ship it. I am seriously disappointed in Zinus's customer support. The bed frame looked nice, but I will not shop with them again after the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Comes with bugs!!! Buy with caution!
customer_reviews.text: While the bed frame was easy to put together, it also came with bugs. I didnt notice it at first, but I've now seen more and more small white worms appearing on the head frame. It's disgusting. I'm not one to write review but I absolutely hate bugs and this was an expensive purchase. I don't even know if there's a way to fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed Bugs!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! This thing is infested with bed bugs, in the headboard and inside the upholstered sides. I’m currently out $500 and counting between extermination costs and doctor visits for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: S Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing! You seriously cannot beat it, for the price. Assembly was so easy. Only thing I needed was for my husband to carry it to the bedroom, I done everything else. It's super heavy, took me an hour to put it together, that's with my four year olds 'help'. Don't hesitate, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Incredible bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy bed. Bough it when the gf moved in with me. Holds us both well, which was a concern of mine as we're both fluffy. But it's been doing great by us. Dont recommend using with a box spring as the height with one would be ridiculous, and the slats provide all the support you need. Also, for...bedroom activities...i do recommend either putting a carpet underneath this thing or getting those rubber feer caps for furniture, as the ones provided offer little protection from this bed scraping into wooden floors. Otherwise, solid product. Would recommend and would even buy again if i had to.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service and not the light gray shown in photo...
customer_reviews.text: So... this product is physically sturdy and easy to assemble, but the color is HORRIBLE. It is NOT the light gray it shows in the picture. It is a sea foam gray which doesn’t go with my color pallet in my room at all. Very disappointed as this product is very heavy and not easily returned. Edit: called their customer service to see if they would just swap me the upholstered pieces, they were also horrible. Their solution was “call amazon”. As always, Amazon’s customer service did everything they could. I ended up ordering an entirely different bed.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great but infested with bed bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Very light weight. The black material located behind the headboard ripped the first day when I was assembling. My fault I suppose. Didn't realize the type of material it was. It lasted almost a year without any issues. Than one day I noticed one of the legs that support the headboard was bent. I took the headboard apart from the rest of the bed and it was completely broken. I suppose we could have kept the bed as is but our little furry puppies like to go under our bed. For safety reasons, we decided to get rid of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, easy to put together. But it didn’t fit my king size mattress. It was too short returned
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Bed sinking in less than 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a breeze, and fun. My wife and I have a queen frame and weight a combined 400 lbs, less than the 500 max weight. Our bed is already sinking. I don’t know if the wood skates are not supportive enough or what’s going on. I ended up getting a refund for the product... but now need to buy a new mattress :( Little room for storage under the frame to have ease of access to things. Not needed though for me so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice but dangerous finishing
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed but poor finishing. Nail protruding from the headboard that pierces my back all the time. I need to consciously put a pillow to avoid injury. Either It tears my skin or my pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Ade O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful designed and packaged
customer_reviews.text: They clearly know what they're doing at Zinus and have put a lot of thought in to how an item should be packaged. It came in an extremely neat, well organized zipper box (picture 1). The directions are simple, easy to follow, and it only took me about 30 minutes from opening the box to fully constructed. The fittings/joints are well made and fit together beautifully. I was a little concerned about buying it before I moved but now that I see how easy it is to take apart and put together, I'm 100% confident I can move it easily! My wife and I found the platform to be very sturdy and I have zero complaints! Quality product and packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Moore

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed - :(
customer_reviews.text: Shipment arrived on time, all parts intact and I was able to assemble it in an hour. After using it for a month of fairly infrequent gentle use the headboard fabric has become wavy and texture is giving in; Also I can hear squeaks, to remedy I retightened all the joints but I can still hear it. I am disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cheap
customer_reviews.text: after I thought I had it ready to assemble laid out I find out it is damaged it was wrapped in plastic and everything rail parts broken and dented crushed.. Was already upset about the quality of it from the un packing.
customer_reviews.author: KEN SUPA

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not picky, but this just kind of sucks. It was going great until I pulled out the last piece of wood, and one of the wood planks looked like it was struck by something. Everything else was fine meaning Zinus intentionally didnt give a sh*t when they put these pieces together. Quality control just went out the window. 1 star. May give it more when I actually sleep on its which I cant believe Im doing because I'm too lazy to return this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, company would not respond
customer_reviews.text: Headboard arrived with a larger than golf ball sized hole right in the center of the headboard. I contacted the company via their customer service warranty link and received no response after two emails. Lousy product and poor customer service and now I am stuck with this defective product :(
customer_reviews.author: E. Raber

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bed for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So the headboard and the foot is hollow, but it is still very sturdy. But the headboard isn't soft and padded, it's quite hard and isn't comfortable to sit against unless you have a pillow or two behind you. With that said though, it looks alot more expensive then it is, it can deal a good amount of scratches from my cats without fibers being ripped around. And when you're doing the dirty deed, it won't squeek or rattle it you having every bolt tightened, so your sister, your parents, your 12 year old daughter and the neighbors German Shepard will thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kevin lam

customer_reviews.title: Bad product support, and parts missing
customer_reviews.text: I got the bed with some of the legs missing, and getting the company to senfmd replacements is like pulling teeth. Long phone call followed by weeks email chain, where they require sending pictures of multiple things. Now i sleep on a bed that is propped up on books on one side while waiting for them to review all the stuff i had to send them. Just send me some dang legs already.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesr

customer_reviews.title: Damn. This bed is lit.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously though... I got this bed to replace my old one that I got from ikea that squeaked so much, like I’m sure My neighbors thought I was having crazy amounts of fun in bed (wink wink) when really it was like just restless legs. But this bed though! Damn. Sturdy and super easy to put together. One person did it. Me. Didn’t even have to go through the ikea relationship test with this bed. My partner just sat back and relaxed while I put this together. Perfect. Seriously invest in this bed. No one will hear any squeaks from restless legs or whatever other consenting adults do in their bed.
customer_reviews.author: Em C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. I mean extremely easy, but it is beautiful and extremely sturdy. It’s more sturdy than my old platform bed that I paid $2000 for. If you need a beautiful and long lasting bed frame, choose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Labvamp

customer_reviews.title: Great setup
customer_reviews.text: It only took about 25min for single person set up. Great for a mattress to sit on without a box spring!I had a slated bedframe with a cheap walmart box tempurpedic bed and then got A bobopedic and it was too thin for the slated frame and I could feel the metal slates!!! So I ordered this and couldnt feel anything! I love it and have slept great ever since! I wish the head board was a little taller cause you cant see it well with the bed made and pillows on it but it's cute. Definitely no room for under bed storage but still, the bed set is GREAT, especially if you want to go without a boxspring!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good bed but wooden slats came chipped off
customer_reviews.text: Ordered queen size for myself when price dropped to $160 approx (inclusive of CA taxes). Assembly was easy and you don't need any other tools other than what comes with the package. The bed is a decent quality but nothing over the board and good for those on budget. I use it with my 12 inches mattress and the headboard size is quite perfect for me (although i wish it was bit longer). Using it for over 4 months now. The wooden slats were bit damaged (chipped) and felt low quality when they arrived. See pictures. But I was sent new wooden slats by the seller when contacted. Didn't had to return the defective ones. Overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jyo

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Expensive furniture stores will overcharge you.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice platform. It was easier to assemble than I thought it would be. Although it is pretty heavy, especially by yourself. It looks great! The 10inch queen memory foam mattress I bought fits perfectly. I'm so happy I bought a bed online instead of getting ripped off in a furniture store. These matresses/platforms are affordable, comfortable and they come with crystal clear instructions...no tools needed! The only reason I docked a star is because it creaks slightly on one side. I just replaced a bed because it squeaked, so I hope this one doesn't get worse. Still, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cstober

customer_reviews.title: I guess my issue is a special case since it ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess my issue is a special case since it only happens when you do "adult activities". I'm assuming the thrusting motion put enough stress on the plastic/rubber end to collapse into the metal pipe as seen in photo 1. Then over time the sharp metal edges started to dig into the floors when I was doing "adult activities". So if you want your floors damaged buy away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well thought out design and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. It takes maybe 20 minutes by yourself. Whoever wrote the instructions should get a bonus because it was very simple and easy to understand. All of the included components fit inside of the headboard so it is easy to break down for moving. The frame itself is a combination of wood and metal, and seems very sturdy. The box it came in was very large, heavy, and awkward to carry. Our UPS carrier had trouble pulling it out of the truck and asked for my help. Definitely recommend bringing a friend if you need to move it a long distance or up/down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: joshua wallace

customer_reviews.title: Decent frame
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the parts on mine had to be assembled in a very specific way and it was a tight fit to get them there. Would've been easier with a second set of hands but I managed to get it done myself. One of my holes for the legs was busted, but I managed to get the leg in sturdy. Customer service offered to send me a replacement but I already had a mattress and was partially through assembling, so I opted out. Nice looking bed frame, though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Review after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed about a year ago for my 13 year old son. It's been a great bed! So much, that I plan on purchasing another Zinus bed for my daughter. It was fairly easy to assemble and is sturdy. The one additional thing I had to purchase was a non-slip mattress pad to go under the mattress. The bed (Ghostbed) fits perfectly on this bed and did not require a box spring. After a year, it still looks and functions as it did on day one. Also, we have moved his room around three times this year and this bed moves nicely. Would definately recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ndiruzza

customer_reviews.title: Great bed and very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I have put together a lot of beds the last few years and this is by far the easiest one. You can tell that the manufacturer actually thought about the end user experience and that defeating moment when you open a box with what seems like a mountain of tiny bolts and pieces and what seems like hours of putting it together. This bed is the opposite experience. There is a lot of attention to "ease of assembly" and it really pays off. It is sturdy and seems to sit a bit higher off the ground than previous beds. It looks great and is sturdy. Extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. I put it together in an hour as in came in 9 separate pieces that were easy to put together. The cloth covering of the head board and side pieces is clean and thick. I love it. I don't think I will ever hide it with a bed skirt. I like how it matches the head board. Also, the light weight of it after putting it together was nice as I was able to move it around the room with just a push of my leg. This is one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christina J Valliere

customer_reviews.title: A very simple bed frame from a great company.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that all the parts and tools were stored in the headboard. The engineering of this bed frame just to get to your doorstep is incredible. I really appreciate the company who put this bed frame together. The directions were easy to follow and well thought out. Bonus points for including a very useful ratcheting tool that will come in handy for many other uses and furniture. Overall, this is a great value and was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: DiddyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic support, design and looks!
customer_reviews.text: Looked at WAYFAIR & AMAZON for a foundation for my new memory foam bed. Amazon have the best value for them! So I ordered this one. The box you get it in is HEAVY. Good sign that the wood slats are hefty. Opened it up and had it assembles in 30 minutes (i wasnt rushing). Tool that is included is great to have if you don't have one already. Slept 1 night and the support was great! No creaking, cracking or spring sounds at all. The bed supports are fantastic! I was amazed that the cross support it uses VS others. This bed is a keeper for me!
customer_reviews.author: Computer Sage

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: There is so much about this product that I like. The pieces of the legs and sides fit inside the headboard for shipping. The directions are easy to follow. The assembly is straightforward. Issues: the two inserts that should have been on the headboard to attach the frame to the left hand side had not been finished and we had to cut the fabric to them. The rails for the bottom portion were about 1/4" too long and we had to trim them. I love the design and the construction - just wish they had paid attention to the small details.
customer_reviews.author: Carole R. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed- assembly won’t break your soul
customer_reviews.text: So I didn’t put this together bc things like this make me lay on the floor and cry, but my BF did and it took him about 30 mins. The tools were provided for you- down to some sooped up Allen wrench that was all clicky and fancy. Everything was packed inside the headboard storage compartment. So easy. Bed is sturdy, looks extremely nice especially considering the low price. This was the smartest planned assembly I have ever seen. This thing was born to smash together in a flash- I think I even could of done it without a mental breakdown. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PandaJosie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for my 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. The slats were all attached to each other and just needed to be laid on the frame, which was also really easy to assemble. It works great in my daughters room with the, and she loves the bed and mattress!
customer_reviews.author: J. Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, great to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: A friend and I put this frame together in less than an hour! Everything you need to build it is included, and easy to identify and use. It was also convenient that they ship it with everything tucked into the headboard. This meant the package itself was pretty compact and easy to manuveur through my small hallway to the bedroom. I've slept on it for 2 nights, with the Zinus Memory Foam 10 inch Green Tea mattress. It was very comfortable and I am so happy Inhave a great frame and matress to sleep on. I haven't heard any creaks or squeaks so far and that too makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Looks fine. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year now and have moved it twice (so put it together three times). It is easy to assemble. Does not rock or squeak. High enough that some things can go under the bed. The headboard can also be secrete storage (many of the parts come in it so it zips open and closed on the wall side) — very cleaver packaging. It is also an inch or two narrower than the other two queen size frames I have which makes it the only that fits in a nook in my new bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Craig From Mass

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Beautifully packaged. Sturdy. No missing or damaged pieces. Fantastic price. Took me all of an hour maybe to set it up. So so easy. They even included the ONE and only tool you’ll need, a ratcheting hex wrench. I did it all by myself. A small woman could do this honestly. The measurements were all 100% on point. The slats al fitted perfectly and unlike others were interwoven with Velcro so they do not slide and squeak! Brilliant! I honestly love this bed. Not one single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: Quick assembly and great look for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bed came conveniently shipped with easy assembly instructions; took me (and just me) 1 hour (with breaks) to fully assemble. It looks great in my room and pairs well with my Zinus 10 inch memory foam mattress. I was nervous the wooden slats that came with it wouldn’t be enough to support the mattress properly but I’ve had them paired together for nearly 6 months now and no problems, no sags (even when looking underneath the frame). Oh and did I mention it’s one of the quietest bed frames I’ve owneded?
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for Decent Price - but sizing is slightly off
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a very nice bed that has a certain aesthetical appeal to it as well. It was very simple to assemble. It is sturdy. It is easy to disassemble and to put into storage. However, my full sized mattress slightly rests over the foot-board, which should not be happening. I feel that it is 1-2 inches too short at the edge and the wooden slates are not deep enough so the bed doesn't completely sink in. I did not feel like disassembling the entire bed, so I sort of just deal with it and I have not had an issue, but nevertheless this is cumbersome given that I paid them $170.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Identity

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Aside from looking nice (the finished product actually looks like the picture), this mattress foundation was super easy to assemble. You'll only need one tool to assemble everything, and it's already included in the package. Now I'm not a handyman by any means, in fact I've probably only assembled..three different Ikea products in my life? So yeah, I always get a bit anxious when I open up the package only to see a handful of nuts, bolts, screws, and parts. To my surprise, the whole assembly only lasted about 20-25 minutes total, as a handful of the screw work has already been done for you. Overall everything seems sturdy, nothing shaking, and nothing squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: Dionisius

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Really handsome headboard and bed frame for a really great price, and it arrived 2 days early! I’m really pleased with this purchase overall, because I was looking at Mattress Firm for beds and a box spring alone was $200 (!!!) with 5-7 business days ETA. This headboard and frame was a better looking solution than a regular metal bed frame that comes from the store. I needed something under $200 and I was working with a small window of time, and this bed frame was a great solution! It was really easy and quick to assemble—only about 30 minutes. Would definitely recommend this headboard and bed frame for anyone looking to dress up their bedroom with some character.
customer_reviews.author: SCBS_1005

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Watch out IKEA!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy. Easy to assemble. Clearly labeled pieces, hardware, and instructions. One flat pack with everything in it, unbox all of it, screw in some screws, and voila! You have a very well made bed for a mere fraction of what anything else would cost you at THIS LEVEL OF QUALITY. I was just really impressed with how well this was to put together and how durable it is. My best friend bought one and recently moved and I saw how he was able to easily disassemble and reassemble the entire thing. And pack all of it back into the headboard for easy moving! If you are thinking of Zinus headboards then you will not be disappointed. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: John Faust

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: Headboard and product quality looked great! Shipping box was damaged, fabric torn on top of headboard, and a gouge out of the wood frame. I could also tell that the package had been opened before (plastic clasps were already clipped). I loved the product and chose to order directly from the manufacture instead
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, sturdy, no wiggle
customer_reviews.text: This queen size bed was SO easy to put together. I had my 16 year old daughter helping me and we got it together in less than an hour. I could have done it myself in a similar time frame, it's amazingly easy to assemble. All the tools needed for assembly were included. This bed is seriously sturdy, there is no wiggle to it at all when it's all put together. I expected it to be a much lower quality for the price paid. I would highly recommend this bed if you like the looks of it. The fabric has kind of a twill look to it, included a close up photo of the fabric
customer_reviews.author: B. Lovell

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: The bed was so easy to put together. It took around 20-40 mins to complete by myself and I’m a woman. The box came with everything you need so you don’t need any extras. I’m about 260 and the bed fits me fine even with another partner that’s 300 lbs. It supports weight fine! Love the bed and I was debating for months to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Quality headboard with metal frame.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, packaged well in 1 box. All contents are stored in headboard. Quick assembly with provided ratchet! I’m 67 and had no trouble dragging contents into bedroom and assembling. Please note that some screws are already on headboard and platform. It would appear otherwise that not enough screws are provided. Do use the very convenient ratchet for quick assembly. I took the extra step to place felt pads on the bottom of frame legs. I can now move the bed freely and easily without scuffing newly installed floor. I am impressed at the quality and sturdiness for the price point. I sleep like a King now. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: One happy and satisfied client
customer_reviews.text: Okay at first i thought i had missing screws but then when i finally realized and analayzed how it worked on that part, hahaa i was laughing my ass out coz it was really simple. Thank u for the fuide and the easy way to put this all together. I was in high hopes i can be able to pull this by myself and i did! I love the bed and the whole experience of doing it! Quality product by Zinus and you've got one really happy client. So worth every penny! I am going to test this sturdiness you've got here hahah The ratchet saved the day!!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended this bed to me after she purchased one. It took a while to come but totally worth the wait. The bed came well packaged. Everything was nicely packaged in the box. Directions were simple. I took everything out of the box, made sure all the parts were there (they were) and looked over the directions. It literally took me 25 minutes to put this bed together. I would recommend this bed to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wanting just a decent looking bed frame until I could get a nicer one. I figured this would be cheaply made and would work for a little while. When I unpacked it, everything was neatly packed inside the headboard, I thought it was genius. The design was well thought out and assembly was pretty easy. I was very impressed with the quality. I am really impressed by zinus. They seem like a very thoughtful and intuitive group. I have a couple friends who have bought some of their products and each one was well made. Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This bed exceeded my expectations! I was expecting a headache and a half putting it together but it just took about 30 minutes and I did it without a second person. The box itself is very very heavy. I ended up unpacking the box downstairs and bringing the pieces upstairs a few at a time. Assembly was simple with the included Allen wrench and a bonus ratcheting Allen wrench! Make sure you loosen the screws quite a bit before putting all the pieces together. It even comes with extra screws in case you lose one. I stored them in the zipper back of the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Assemble in an hour
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric and color is better then pictured. I thought it might look a little tacky even but I'm actually quite happy with the way it looks. I was able to open the box and have the whole thing assembled in less then an hour. All tools needed are included, and directions made sense. I probably wouldn't have even used them if I didn't read reviews about tricky instructions. Bed Frame came double boxed, The outer box was torn and dirty. The inner box had no signs of wear or damage.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory McConnell

customer_reviews.title: One year + review
customer_reviews.text: This frame withstands not only the test of time (so far) but the test of children. This includes jumping pushing, pulling, more jumping, hiding under, etc. My 5 year old can hide under this bed but my one year old can not figure out how to get under it so that’s a plus for me! It does not bang against the wall (thank god) and it is extremely sturdy! There isn’t really any storage capacity but I’m sure there’s some kind of shallow storage boxes you could buy to slide under the bed. It was extremely easy for me (at 9 months pregnant at the time) to assemble by myself. Love this frame!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation but not cat-proof.
customer_reviews.text: This bed looks amazing and is super durable. I've moved a few times with this bed and it's really easy to install and take apart. It's really light, yet, sturdy. I wish the height is a few inches higher so I can throw more crap under the bed, but it's alright. My cat loves to hide under the bed, too! Beware if you have cats because they will scratch up the 4 corners in no time!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. Quality instructions and pieces. The tool supplied works great! Paired well with the Zinus memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't understand the horrible reviews for this bed....and bed bugs in a brand new bed frame? What lies. Anyways, we bought the full size for our daughter and this bed is awesome. All parts are here, easy to put together, they even include a small Allen key ratchet along with an Allen key, which is fantastic and surprising! There is a nice note from the company also. The bed frame is very sturdy. My husband (this is his wife writing this) is beyond impressed with this company and this bed and he isnt easily impressed. I highly recommend this bed and this company.
customer_reviews.author: The Ogburns

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My package came in yesterday and I set it up today with my husband. The package was very heavy so we had to take it out of the box first. At first, we were very confused because we only saw the headboard then figured out that everything was INSIDE the headboard which was AMAZING! It was very easy to assemble compared to products from ikea - took about 40 mins to put together. The instructions were simple to follow and the bed frame seems sturdy. The fabric and color was better than I expected. There isnt much space to put under the bed but thats a plus for me as i will prob end up piling junk under there.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: If you're sick of the box-spring/metal frame combo like I was, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this! I've been use to the bare metal bed frame + box spring for too long and this was a huge breath of fresh air. The quality on this item is very good and the way it was shipped was absolutely perfect - it was even fun to put together because it didn't take me very long at all (thanks to the articulated instructions). If you're looking for a bed frame and considering this one, do it. Not only is the item priced very economically, it looks perfect in my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: S Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for great price! Easy and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, no noise, looks expensive, easy to assemble! Be sure to get all the parts from inside the headboard behind zipper and read the directions. I was able to assemble alone in about 30mins. No other tools are needed. Was perfect height from floor to store stuff underneath and I just put my memory foam mattress on top, no box spring and it feels INCREDIBLY comfortable! Highly recommend for price and even shipping was easy to my front door!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Holloway

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the same mattress and box spring w a poorly fitted metal frame for my whole life, and I decided it was time for a change. I bought this bed platform for a few reasons, I wanted my bed high off of the ground, I didn’t want a box spring anymore, and I loved the design of it. Everything you need comes zipped up in the headboard! I put the platform together yesterday and it took me about 45 minutes (only bc I messed up 😂) and it looks great! I think the wood is good and sturdy and also it doesn’t squeak or anything, but I’ll update if anything happens!
customer_reviews.author: Brookelynnee J

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy • 5 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely cannot get over the quality of this frame, for the price it is a steal. It was very easy to assemble, my mother law and I assembled it together and we got it done in less than an hour, it can be done by yourself- may just take a little longer! It is very sturdy, and is perfectly matched to the given dimensions, I would suggest this frame to anyone, especially given the price! It also doesn’t require a bed frame, so makes it much more worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: Best Furniture I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This company is genius for the way in which the bed was pre-assembled and packaged. The directions were so easy to follow and it took me all of 20 minutes to put the bed together. I love this stability, the quality of the fabric, wood, and metal, and the overall look. I was truly impressed with the mini rachet wrench that was enclosed which made things so much easier. I will be finding other furniture that you all have to offer. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to setup & Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 beds for our new house. The first bed was not this one and was a bit difficult to setup. The directions were awful. This bed arrived yesterday and it was so easy to set up. Everything worked exactly as the directions stated. The bed is rock solid and does not squeak when rolling over. So far very pleased and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Linda Edeiken

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size wooden boards
customer_reviews.text: Cant finish building it. The wooden boards don't fit the product. I've tried everything..they just aren't cut right. The sticker says manufactured 2/2020 so I assume the cut was just off by 1-2 inches. I technically can get it to fit if I sanded every board but my bedroom isn't a workshop. I cannot recommend this product based on my experience. The grey also looks a little greenish and the headboard looks flatter than expected when comparing it to the photo. I will see if CS can help me.... i don't know where to sleep tonight...
customer_reviews.author: Spider Man

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Frame - Short headboard - Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Bought the king charcoal frame for our bedroom. First impressions were great. Easy to put together. Once together, the headboard is pretty low profile. We should of known by looking at the dimension clearly listed. Only real complaint is the smell. Ordered two of these and both have a really strong bad smell. We have tried using febreeze but the smell comes back. It's somehow making it's way into our sheets / pillow cases so we keep having to wash them. Right now it's a 3 star product. If the smell wasn't so bad, it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gene McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The entire thing comes cleverly boxed into the headboard. Super conveniently prepped. You only have to put the main screws in. It’s not a mess like most furniture items. I would buy again anytime. Worth the money and easy to assemble. Extra screws and even a ratchet tool to make it easier for you. I saw that this item has 4.7 stars and I still had to do a review just to make it better. It’s a smart buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is fragile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one in the month of Nov'19. After 6 months i noticed the leg and the board that it got attached to got bent. I reached out to customer service and after couple of weeks they informed me that they could not find replacemnent parts and agreed to refund, provided i pack and send the item back to them. Funny thing is i dont have carton boxes and the item is too big to be fit in my car and their customer service is pathetic. I will stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great under bed storage, small footprint for apartment bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: Having slept on this bed for many months at our daughter’s and loved it, we purchased the same for our apartment. My 81 year old husband had no trouble putting it together, albeit, over the course of a couple of days. We chose the great looking sage headboard and the very comfortable 8” mattress. Love the foam which is super comfy and doesn’t bounce or squeak, etc when you sit down. There’s plenty of room under the bed for zipper storage containers. Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Egan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great platform, nice and sturdy even though I was worried when opening and putting everything together. All the packaging is in a zipper on the back of the headboard which means a good portion of the headboard is hollow. Thankfully the portion you touch when your mattress is on it is padded. The headboard is smaller than you think. Once a mattress about 14 inches is on, it wont be much to show but it still looks very nice. Instructions are terrible so just have someone who is handy try to decrpyt it with you. This requires 2 people to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Al Roge

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Idk why there are any negative reviews, this king size bed is SUPERB!!! Super easy to install, so easy a kid could do it. Included all the hardware and tools required to assemble it. Very sturdy!!! Not bulky at all, and sits lower to the ground. 10/10 would recommend!! I will purchase all future bed frames from Zinus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hammon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together bed frame! Looks like an expensive piece for an affordable price. Per the other reviews the pieces come inside the headboard so after setting up you can store things in it that you need to hide or just anything really. The reason the headboard looks shorter on my bed is because we have a 14” mattress. Otherwise it would show more headboard but we don’t mind! Love the pattern on the headboard as well. Seems like it is a very sturdy bed and we have not heard any creaking at all. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: so glad i went with this bed!
customer_reviews.text: i’ve been loving this bed and price is a plus. wasn’t too hard to put together and has everything you need stored in the headboard. headboard is nicely cushioned but it’s all in all sturdy. i don’t worry about needing another for a long time. shipping took longer than expected at almost a month but i ordered in the middle of the pandemic so i don’t believe it is entirely their fault and everyone else said that it typically comes fast so i’d go for it if you are worried about ordering this from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: BVREED

customer_reviews.title: Paid for light sage gray, got dark Navy blue. Kind of a large item to have to return
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid extra for the lighter sage gray in a king size. What arrived was a dark Navy. Husband set it up before I got home. Adark Navy wasn't even a color option on this, if I wanted dark I would have choose the cheaper dark gray. I'm already sleeping on our couch tonight as the matteress we ordered was supposed to be delivered by 8 tonight but I guess they had more important things to do as well.
customer_reviews.author: juls king

customer_reviews.title: Looks Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this bed and is very sturdy. Have had it for about 3 months now and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kimjim16

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! All tools included. Took me only about an hour to assemble all alone. Handling of the box is tricky bc it’s so heavy but not a big deal if you’ve got space to lay it down. The headboard itself was actually missing a hole in the fabric and I panicked quickly. But I just had to tear a small hole to make it fit. Make sure all the screws are tightly adjusted. That was the only irritant I had was properly loosening the appropriate screws and then re tightening them. Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lea Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: These products are a hit and a miss. I purchased a queen bed in 2017 that has held up great. The full frame, however, is a completely different story. I filed a replacement claim because I was still in warranty. The claim was filed the first week in September the first replacement mysteriously got lost in transit. Now I'm being told I may not get a replacement until December because they are having issues with their shipping carrier. Purchase with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Strong and dependable bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few platform bed frames throughout the years and I will say this is the most sturdy bed frame. It has a center support beam to help support the middle of the bed. It took about 30 minutes to put the entire frame together, very simple. The beams use velcro to keep them in place and we haven't had any problems with the memory foam mattress moving or shifting from the frame. If I ever need another bed frame I would buy Zinus or this exact same frame.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Newman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Like most of us, I’ve been assembling IKEA and other flat box furniture for decades now, and I was sincerely impressed with this one. Purchased for my 12 y.o. daughter, she and I unpackaged it, carried it upstairs in pieces, assembled it, and cleaned up the packing materials in less than an hour. Seems sturdy so far; bolts will need to be tightened from time to time. Packaging was solid yet minimal and I appreciate the lack of excess waste as well. The upholstery is of a nice quality, exactly as advertised. Like all platform beds, be sure to note measurements...a box spring was not needed, but if one was used it would block the whole headboard.
customer_reviews.author: ErinL

customer_reviews.title: Assembled Alone in Under an Hour!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 24 yr old woman and I was able to assemble this all by myself during my hour lunch break. The design is easy and rather clever. All the parts come nicely packaged within the headboard itself! The bed frame looks is as pictured and it feels sturdy and secure. I just put it together so I cannot speak to how it holds up but I can try to update this down the line! Only critiques I have are that the tufted headboard is not super plush (although it is exactly as pictured-- flat) and the wooden slats were splintery. So not even real complaints and certainly not deterrents. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect after initial hiccups. Looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up assembling the frame base a little off, which made the overall set up look awkward. But after due correction, the assembly was quick. Feels great. and doesnt make squeaky sounds. Stable. Cant store much underneath, but that's the purpose/selling point of this bed. I put a Sealy Mattress, 12 inch height and the half of the head board is pretty much covered. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nisarg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 61 yr. old woman with a slowly emptying nest. When my son moved out I wanted to start updating the empty bedroom to use as a guest room. I bought this frame and it was delivered before expected and just before Christmas. I brought it in the house by myself, put it together by myself. My first guest were of course married children coming home for Christmas and they immediately commented on the style of this bed and the fact that although they had slept on the mattress before it was so much more comfortable on this frame. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth bachmurski

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Designed by Engineers (in the best way)
customer_reviews.text: My 16-year old son and I managed to put together this very attractive bedframe in exactly 30 minutes with no do-overs, fussing at each other, or cursing. In fact, as we went through the process he continually exclaimed at the genius of the people who designed it. You get your first clue when all the items are stored within the headboard - dead clever. We are using this in the guest room, but I honestly like it so much I may be ordering one for my room, especially now that I know how quickly and easily it goes together. Plus, it's lightweight but still quite sturdy. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: SassC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value- Easily Put Together
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! Easy to put together- my son and I did it without tools - other than the little one that comes with it. He needed a little bit of muscle to get it lined up right but it came together in 30-45 minutes. It looks sharp! I did not expect top of the line for this bargain buy - but it looks like good quality. We got the 8” memory foam/spring hybrid mattress with it, and I need to buy a 2” topper to make it perfect. It was just right for a young man’s room. It will work for anyone. Ours is Full size. Got 2 of them for two of our teen boys.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli - AdventureHS com

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they asked me about storage capacity for a platform bed but it does have a pocket behind the headboard where the parts are packed when shipped. I suppose you could use it for hiding/storing things. But I was thoroughly impressed with this product. It’s HEAVY so be prepared when it shows up. The weight leads to a robust product so I was OK with it but we had to break it down into pieces before we could carry it upstairs. It is cleverly engineered and packed and I found it was easy to put together with the included ratchet tool. Once completed it is a sturdy and great looking product. Could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CtrlFLDC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, and easier to bring inside if you open the box first... ;-)
customer_reviews.text: This is a multiple item purchase for us. Sturdy bed frame; nicely appointed, yet simple headboard. Liked it so well, we ordered one for our guest room as well :-) The entire frame was very easy to assemble, they recommend 2 people but 1 can do it with extra effort. Zinus even includes the basic tools needed for assembly. The hardest part of the process was getting the 100# box from the UPS truck to the desired bedroom -- pro tip: open the box curbside, remove the frame pieces from the headboard (they are shipped inside a "secret" zippered pocket) and carry them individually...everything is so much lighter that way!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Pitstop

product_meta.title: Zinus Shalini Upholstered Platform Bed / Mattress Foundation / Wood Slat Support / No Box Spring Needed / Easy Assembly, Queen
product_meta.description: Color:Dark Grey| Size:Queen| Pattern Name:Platform BedThe Shalini Platform Bed is your ticket to a total bedroom transformation. With its sophisticated stitching, button tufting and neutral-toned fabric, this foundation makes an impressive centerpiece that can really pull a room together. The Shalini is equipped with a wood slat platform designed to support any mattress without a box spring and a reliable steel frame that will hold up to years of sweet dreams. A worry-free 5 year warranty is also included, along with the confidence you get from its thousands of happy customer reviews. Plus, it’s shipped to your door with everything you need to assemble it in the back of the headboard, saving you hassle, headaches, and best of all, time!
feature_bullets: Woven Fabric Upholstery With Steel Framework

GOOD LOOKS, CONFIDENT STYLE - Thousands of positive reviews don’t lie - the Shalini, with its diamond pattern stitching that brightens up any room and easy-as-pie assembly, is highly rated for a reason

DURABLY DESIGNED - Interior steel framework and dense foam padding add comfort and longevity; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 250 pounds, while all other sizes can support up to 500 pounds

NO BOX SPRING NEEDED - Durable wood slats support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring; for the twin and full sizes, slats are spaced 2.7 inches apart, and for other sizes, slats are spaced 3.2 inches apart

EASY ASSEMBLY – Everything you need is efficiently packed into one box and shipped straight to your door; all parts, tools and instructions are conveniently located in the zippered compartment of the headboard for easy, two-person assembly in under an hour
Worry-free 5 year limited warranty included; mattress sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars13,416 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Woven Fabric Upholstery With Steel Framework
